articles.title: Asia shares meander ahead of c.bank meetings - Reuters.com
articles.description: Asian shares stalled in cautious trading on Monday as investors braced for central bank decisions in Europe, Japan and the United States this week, along with U.S. inflation data that will likely influence the Federal Reserve's monetary policy.

articles.title: European markets head for higher open as investors await central bank meetings - CNBC
articles.description: European markets opened higher Monday as investors prepare for a week of key central bank meetings in the United States, Asia and Europe.
articles.content:
European markets opened higher Monday as investors prepare for a week of key central bank meetings in the United States, Asia and Europe.
